result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: This case dismissed/read in this date per resolution in 16CF58.  Minutes taken in that matter.
Status conference on November 30, 2016 at 10:00 am.

11:24 a.m.  Attorney Jameson R. Whitney in court for Defendant Amanda J Jones. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Amanda J Jones not in court.  16CF58, 16CM21, and 15CM223 were set for 11 a.m. status.  On def's non-appearance, DA asks for warrant.  Atty. W states that the parties are working towards resolution; asks for adjournment.  Court sets 11/30 at 10 as next date; warrant ordered and stayed.  Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on November 2, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Status in 16CF58, 16CM21, and 15CM223.  Defendant Amanda J Jones in court with attorney Jameson R. Whitney. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Information filed in the CF case, carrying forth same as the complaint.  Def waives right to prelim with colloquy.  Bindover.  NG pleas entered.  Further status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for November 2, 2016 at 11:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on July 28, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
3 cases called together (16CF58, 16CM21, 15CM223). Atty Yang states he has been asked to withdraw from the cases in Richland County, presents motion. Court will reset these matters to July 28 @ 1:30.

Defendant Amanda J Jones not in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Michael Yang in court for Defendant Amanda J Jones.  Counsel inform the Court that the def was not writted; adjournment requested.  Def to be writted for the appearance.  Status conference scheduled for July 5, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Amanda J Jones in court with attorney Michael Yang. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Defendant Amanda J Jones in court with attorney Michael Yang. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Formal reading waived.  Court states charge and informs def of the possible max. penalties as well as her rights.  Def stands mute for entry of NG plea.  Status conference scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Initial appearance at 12-11-2015 01:30 pm

Attorney Michael Yang in court for Defendant Amanda J Jones. Defendant does not appear. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. DA requests a warrant but requests it be stayed until tomorrow at 1:30. Warrant is authorized but stayed until tomorrow at 1:30. Def calls in. Parties move to adjourn to Friday afternoon.  Initial appearance scheduled for December 11, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
